text: Ta rang ta de fumu zuo zai bao yi shang, ranhou, tamen xiang ta wen'an. Ta [you su fu] shuo:â€œWo de fuqin a! Zhe shi wo yiqian mengjing de jieshi, wo de zhu [an la] que yi shi nage meng chengwei shi shi. Ta [an la] que yi youdai wo. Dangshi, ta cong jianyu li ba wo jiu chulai. Emo zai wo he wo di gegemen zhi jian shan qi chouhen hou, ta cong youmu shenghuo zhong ba nimen dai dao zheli lai. Wo de zhu dui tasuo yiyu zhe que shi zui ci'ai de. Ta que shi quan zhi de, zui ruizhi de.
